segments.text: I'd appreciate it if you could help me pick out a gift for my daughter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would she be interested in a laptop ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's exactly what I was thinking of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A Mac would be an excellent gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like Macs . How much for a Mac ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take a 15 - inch Pro home right now for only $ 2,100 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A Mac it is . I'll take one home with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She'll be very happy with this . And how do you plan to pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll use my VISA , if that's okay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , if you'll just sign here , the Mac is all yours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will she need anything besides what's in this box ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything she needs is right here in the box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate your help . Maybe I'll be back for more computer stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your daughter should get straight A's from now on . Good-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
